boardgame.name: Ultimate Werewolf: Deluxe Edition
เกมล่าปริศนามนุษย์หมาป่า
boardgame.description: Ultimate Werewolf is an interactive game of deduction for two teams: Villagers and Werewolves. The Villagers don't know who the Werewolves are, and the Werewolves are trying to remain undiscovered while they slowly eliminate the Villagers one at a time. A Moderator (who isn't on a team) runs the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ultimate Werewolf takes place over a series of game days and nights. Each day, the players discuss who among them is a Werewolf and vote out a player. Each night, the Werewolves choose a player to eliminate, while the Seer learns whether one player is a Werewolf or not. The game is over when either all the Villagers or all the Werewolves are eliminated._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Ultimate Werewolf: Deluxe Edition features all new artwork, a great new design, totally rewritten and more comprehensive rules, and an even better moderator scorepad. What's more, it supports more players than ever: 75 of your closest friends can converge on one or more villages using the components in this box._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2014 Golden Geek Best Party Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: TGT 069: Games Based on Existing IPs

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups

listing.notes: Kickstarter edition new in shrink. Includes the Gus Batts artpack. Shipping cost to be met by the buyer, although pick up can be arranged if you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re in the Dublin area.

Bezier Games (BEZUWDX) Ultimate Werewolf is an interactive game of deduction for two teams: Villagers and Werewolves. The Villagers don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t know who the Werewolves are, and the Werewolves are trying to remain undiscovered while they slowly eliminate the Villagers one at a time. A Moderator (who isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t on a team) runs the game. Ultimate Werewolf takes place over a series of game days and nights. Each day, the players discuss who among them is a Werewolf and vote out a player. Each night, the Werewolves choose a player to eliminate, while the Seer learns whether one player is a Werewolf or not. The game is over when either all the Villagers or all the Werewolves are eliminated. Ultimate Werewolf: Deluxe Edition features all new artwork, a great new design, totally rewritten and more comprehensive rules, and an even better moderator score pad. What_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s more, it supports more players than ever: 75 of your closest friends can converge on one or more villages using the components in this box.

_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;GAME + ALL ARTPACKS + ARTIFACTS EXPANSION_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; from Kickstarter. Includes Ultimate Werewolf: Deluxe Edition Kickstarter box, all 16 art packs, and Artifacts expansion with artwork that matches the new Deluxe edition. All unopened.
